Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Hello,

I would like to manually add ad credit using my credit card — for example, $300 or $1,000.

Automatic payments are not ideal for me, because after every $10 charge, my credit card may get blocked due to security reasons. That’s why I prefer to make a manual payment before running ads.

Could you please enable this option for my account?

Thank you.

Hi Murat, thanks for reaching out! Currently, the ad credit functionality is not available for newly created accounts by default. To enable this option, your account must complete and pass business verification and accumulate over $5,000 in spend. Once these conditions are met, you can establish a relationship with an Account Manager who can request the ad credit functionality to be enabled for you. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to contact our Ad Support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com.

My postback in Event Management is set up correctly, but we can’t test it right now. Could you please approve it manually?

I’d like to add it to my campaign later, but since I can’t run the test at the moment, I’m requesting manual approval.

I understand your situation, but unfortunately, we cannot manually approve postbacks without testing. It's important to ensure that the postback is functioning correctly to avoid any issues with tracking conversions. If you're unable to test it right now, I recommend reaching out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance or guidance on how you might proceed. Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!

My postback in Event Management is set up correctly, but we can’t test it right now. Could you please approve it manually?


I’d like to add it to my campaign later, but since I can’t run the test at the moment, I’m requesting manual approval.

I understand your situation, but unfortunately, we can't manually approve postbacks without a successful test. It's important to ensure that the postback is functioning correctly to avoid any issues with tracking conversions. If you encounter any problems during testing, feel free to reach out for assistance. You can also refer to our Event Tracking guidelines for more details: [Event Tracking](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25226963388813-How-to-integrate-a-general-NewsBreak-Postback).
